Summary: Looked like bright star stationary, then shot off very fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking up at the stars, very nice clear evening. It was brighter than the North star or other stars. I thought it was a star. It was stationary then it got brighter right before it took off. I was very surprised and wasnt expecting that. It took off so fast I almost couldnt follow it with my eyes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Silver Lake
There were no other sightings in Silver Lake on or around September 5th 2012
